subject: p12410066
History: Status post mediastinoscopy, assess for pneumothorax.
Findings: Comparison is made with prior study and. There is no evident pneumothorax. Cardiac size is top normal. The cardiomediastinum is midline, there is total reexpansion of the left lung. Left perihilar opacities have almost resolved. There is some atelectasis though in the left upper lobe, increasing from prior study. The right lung is grossly clear. There is no pleural effusion.
